message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you buy it now, making the price $90. If you don't buy it now, I'll sell it to someone else at the full price of $100.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount. I'll take the high-quality product at $90.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! This high-quality product is similar to the one you just bought, but it has some additional features that you might find useful. I'm willing to sell it to you for the full price of $100, but I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth $20 if you buy it now. If you don't buy it now, I'll sell it to someone else at the same price, and you'll miss out on the accessory.
I'm interested in the additional features and the free accessory. I'll take this high-quality product at $100, including the accessory.
